com.characterforming.jrte

Interface INamedValue


  • public interface INamedValue
    Snapshot wrapper for named values. These contain a direct reference to the value buffer as of the time of the call, and should be treated as transient objects (assign to stack variables, use in stack based collections, etc, only).
    Author:
    kb

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIndex()
      Get the value index.
      int getLength()
      Get the actual number of char in the value array as of the time of the call
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the value name
      char[] getValue()
      Get a reference to the value.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the value name
        Returns:
        The value name

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Get the value index.
        Returns:
        The value index

      • getValue

        char[] getValue()
        Get a reference to the value. Use getLength() to determine the actual number of char in the returned array reference.
        Returns:
        A direct reference to the value array as of the time of the call

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Get the actual number of char in the value array as of the time of the call
        Returns:
        The actual number of char in the value array as of the time of the call
